data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, i.e. 08th November, 2022, has inter alia, approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022.
